src:
Bamsoet Didorong Maju ke Gelanggang, Pro-Airlangga Menghadang
04 Nov 2019, 20:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) kembali didorong maju ke forum Musyawarah Nasional Partai Golkar memperebutkan kursi ketua umum. Loyalis petahana Airlangga Hartarto menghadang Bamsoet menuju gelanggang.
Bamsoet, pada akhir Juli 2019, memang sudah mendeklarasikan diri sebagai calon ketua umum Partai Golkar, menantang Airlangga Hartarto. Setelah proses panjang, Airlangga kemudian menyerahkan kursi Ketua MPR kepada Bamsoet dan seketika isu panas perebutan kursi Golkar-1 sempat mereda, namun itu hanya sementara.
"Pak Bamsoet dipastikan maju sebagai calon Ketua Umum dalam Munas Partai Golkar yang akan datang. Saya sudah beberapa kali mengkonfirmasi hal tersebut kepada beliau," kata Darul kepada wartawan, Minggu (3/11/2019).
"Beliau mendapat dorongan yang kuat dari pemegang hak suara Munas Golkar, yaitu Ketua DPD Partai Golkar provinsi, kabupaten dan kota," imbuh loyalis Bamsoet ini.
Klaim Darul Siska ini tentu memicu reaksi dari kubu Airlangga.
text:
Bamsoet Pushed Forward to the Arena, Pro-Airlangga Block
Nov 04 2019, 20:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) was again pushed forward to the Golkar Party National Deliberation forum for the chair of the general chair. Incumbent loyalist Airlangga Hartarto blocks Bamsoet from the arena.
Bamsoet, at the end of July 2019, had indeed declared himself as a candidate for the general chair of the Golkar Party, challenging Airlangga Hartarto. After a long process, Airlangga then handed the chair of the MPR Chair to Bamsoet and immediately the heated issue over the Golkar-1 seat had subsided, but that was only temporary.
"Pak Bamsoet is sure to advance as a candidate for the General Chair in the upcoming Golkar Party National Conference. I have confirmed this to him several times," Darul told reporters on Sunday (3/11/2019).
"He received a strong encouragement from the Golkar National Conference voting rights holders, namely the Chairman of the provincial, district and city Golkar Party DPD," added the Bamsoet loyalist.
Darul Siska's claim certainly triggered a reaction from the Airlangga camp.
